title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Thursday, 26 November 2016 - BBC News
summary: the main headlines for thursday 26 november 2015 : .
kelvin thomas has completed his takeover of northampton town .
corby borough council says it 's disappointed the town has not been given `` enterprise zone '' status by the government .
we 'll have more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on friday .

documents.title: our live coverage throughout the day
text: local live is finished for today , but we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with all the latest news , weather sport and travel .

documents.title: mp bone says commons should debate syria 'through the night '
text: peter bone , mp for wellingborough , has said when the house of commons comes to vote on air strikes against the so-called islamic state , there should be `` no time limit '' on the debate .
the conservative mp said parliament could `` speak through the night before voting so everyone can get in '' .
david cameron says he wo n't call a commons vote until he can be sure of winning it .
author: BBC News UK

documents.title: winger holmes in line for return from injury for cobblers
text: away from the takeover , northampton town manager chris wilder told me that winger ricky holmes will be returning from injury and will be in the cobblers squad on saturday .
author: Joe Townsend
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: headlines : thomas completes takeover of cobblers misconduct for pc who pepper sprayed colleague
text: if you 're catching up :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: weather : cloudy with some patchy rain
text: it will be cloudy overnight with fog and patchy rain and lows of 8c ( 46f ) .
after a cloudy morning tomorrow a band of heavy rain will move across the area top temperature : 11c ( 52f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: man seen walking down street naked in northamptonshire
text: a man has been taken to hospital after he was found walking down a street naked in rushden .
author: Northampton Chronicle & Echo

documents.title: george north re-signs with northampton saints
text: wales wing george north has signed a new contract at northampton saints to keep him at the club past the end of this current season .
the club would n't say how long his new contract is for , but north , 23 , said he was `` massively delighted '' to re-sign .
author: Laura Cook
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: police sergeant who shot colleague with pepper spray guilty of misconduct
text: a police sergeant who shot pepper spray in another officer 's face as `` banter '' has been found guilty of misconduct at hear at police headquarters at wootton hall .
pc greg taylor said he accidentally shot an officer in the forehead with the spray for speaking during a police briefing he was leading .
he was given a final written warning which will remain on his file for 18 months .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton town takeover complete , but what happens with the court cases ?
text: kelvin thomas has completed his takeover of northampton town and has given an update on the upcoming court dates with northampton borough council and hm revenue & customs
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: nurse who slept on the job and was under the influence of drugs struck off
text: a nurse who carried out her duties at northampton general hospital under the influence of drugs in 2013 has been struck off .
margaret munangatire was also found to have slept at work at the hospital in 2012 and self-administered drugs in 2013 .
the striking off follows a four day hearing at the nursing and midwifery council relating to charges during her time at the nuneaton nhs trust and northampton general .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: kelvin thomas : northampton town must 'under promise and over deliver '
text: new executive chairman at northampton town , kelvin thomas , says although he 's bought northampton town for £ 1 , in reality it is a £ 4m deal as that 's what they 'll likely need to invest .
he said : `` we must under promise and over deliver , '' adding that staff - who have n't been paid for seven weeks - should get paid next week .
author: Joe Townsend
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: supporters ' trust 'delighted ' with kelvin thomas cobblers takeover
text: the deal for kelvin thomas to take control of northampton town has been completed and the supporters ' trust , which raised more than £ 42,000 for any potential fighting fund , has taken to twitter
absolutely delighted that the kelvin thomas deal has been completed .
a new era begins for # ntfc
@ twitterid good news indeed so who is bringing the money ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid david bower .

documents.title: kelvin thomas becomes new 'executive chairman ' of northampton town
text: the takeover of northampton town has been completed by kelvin thomas ( centre ) who becomes executive chairman .
he also says hm revenue & customs have been paid in full for their outstanding £ 166,000 tax bill .
his now controlling consortium includes david bower , who becomes a director , and mike wailing , who is a non-executive director .
author: James Burridge
BBC Look East

documents.title: weather : cloudy with chance of patchy rain
text: this afternoon will be cloudy and there is a chance of a some patchy rain and drizzle around .
top temperature of 9c ( 48f ) .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: headlines : cobblers takeover set to be announced council contacts police over payments to mp
text: here 's what are talking about :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: kettering man with diabetes prolongs life by becoming a vegan
text: a man from kettering who suffered from type 2 diabetes has prolonged his life after becoming a vegan .
author: Northants Herald & Post

documents.title: matfield could make northampton saints debut tomorrow
text: south africa lock forward and world cup winner victor matfield has been named on the bench for northampton saints ' premiership game against gloucester at franklin 's gardens
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: saints backs coach king says england in for an 'exciting period '
text: all six english clubs , including northampton saints , won last weekend in the european champions cup and saints backs coach alex king says that 's good news for the national team
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: today 's big 78 derngate
text: the main image on today 's page is of 78 derngate , the house in northampton remodelled in 1916-17 by charles rennie mackintosh for w. j. bassett-lowke .
if you want to send us a then please email us .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: first boater sails in and moors up at new marina at earls barton
text: the first boater has sailed in to a new 141-berth marina at earls barton .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: george osborne tax credits u-turn : 'a highlight moment '
text: the bbc 's vicky young has been to a logistics firm in corby to see what workers their make of george osborne 's u-turn on tax credits cuts .
author: BBC News UK

documents.title: problems on the a43 in towcester
text: problems on the a43 in towcester

documents.title: headlines : police contacted over payments made to mp 's local party cobblers takeover details anticipated
text: here 's what we are looking at into the afternoon :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton saints announce team to face gloucester in premiership tomorrow
text: matt williams , ethan waller , paul hill , teimana harrison , lee dickson , jj hanrahan , ken pisi and south african record caps holder victor matfield are all on the bench .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: police contacted by council over payments made to mp 's local party
text: northamptonshire police has confirmed it has been contacted by northampton borough council about payments made to david mackintosh 's local party .
yesterday , the bbc revealed that the northampton south mp is under investigation by the conservative party for payments made to his campaign fund .
that includes a payment from a businessman connected to the troubled redevelopment at sixfields .
mr mackintosh still has n't commented .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: wellingborough golf club 's ryan evans starts his first european tour season
text: you can follow the leaderboard via the european tour website .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: man attempts to pull woman from her car near abington park
text: police in northampton are looking for a man who tried to pull a woman out of her car in abington park crescent on tuesday afternoon .
the man opened the driver 's side door and tried to pull the victim out of the vehicle , but was disturbed by a member of the public and ran off across abington park .
he is described as white with a bald head and a large tattoo of a tiger on the right hand side of his neck .
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: corby council leader 'disappointed ' by lack of enterprise zone announcement
text: corby borough council leader tom beattie has been reacting to chancellor george osborne 's autumn statement yesterday - in which the town missed out on the chance to become an enterprise zone
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: former northampton south mp joins calls for cobblers inquiry
text: yesterday the bbc revealed northampton south mp david mackintosh is under investigation by the conservative party or payments made to his campaign fund .
that includes a payment from a businessman connected to the troubled redevelopment at sixfields .
mr mackintosh still has n't commented .
external auditors and the police are already looking at what happened to a £ 10.25m loan from northampton borough council to northampton town
mr mackintosh 's predecessor , the conservative brian binley , told me what he has made of what he has heard
author: Stuart Linnell
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: headlines : cobblers takeover expected man tried to pull woman out of her car

documents.title: daventry diners urged to check restaurant ratings
text: a scheme to provide food hygiene ratings for restaurants in daventry is marking its fifth anniversary with diners urged to make use of the scheme over the christmas period .
author: Daventry Express

documents.title: care england says northamptonshire faces a care home beds 'crisis '
text: it is claimed around a third of elderly people in the county could struggle to find a residential care home because many are being forced to close for financial reasons

documents.title: northants batsman levi : 'it 's great to re-sign with county '
text: south african batsman richard levi has been reacting overnight to yesterday 's announcement that he has signed a new two-year deal with northants for all formats of the game .
great to be back at @ twitterid for the upcoming seasons !
looking forward to more success and memories # steelbacks
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid good luck levi ! ! !
do us proud as always !
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid good luck # bombs
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: good morning and welcome to local live for northamptonshire
text: hello once again - between now and 18:00 we 'll be bringing you the latest news , weather , sport and travel for northamptonshire .
if you want to get in touch you can via email , twitter and facebook .
